David Tennant brought Crowley to life superbly.
David Tennant as Crowley is the best cast choice! Thank you for the video
His little nose wrinkle in the bathtub kills me every time. Great video, thanks so much for making it!

I love it, you got all the coolness he’s trying to convey and then included the bits when Aziraphale is doing it better.

bc obviously nobody thinks Crowley is as cool as Aziraphale does
